processing_device.label: Processing Device:
processing_device.tooltip: Use CPU for universal compatibility or NVIDIA GPU for significantly faster processing (requires a compatible card and setup).

target_lang.label: Target Language:
target_lang.tooltip: The language to translate the text into.

translator.label: Translator Model:
translator.tooltip: The translation engine to use. Some are offline, others may require an API key.

enable_translator_chain.label: Enable Translator Chain:
enable_translator_chain.tooltip: Enable this to use multiple translators in a sequence. This will disable the main translator selection above.

translator_chain.label: Translation Steps:
translator_chain.tooltip: Add translation steps in order. The output of one step becomes the input for the next.

no_text_lang_skip.label: Translate Same Language
no_text_lang_skip.tooltip: If checked, the translator will still run even if the source and target languages are the same.

skip_lang.label: Skip Translating from these Languages:
skip_lang.tooltip: Selected languages will NOT be translated, even if they are the source language. Useful for ignoring certain text.

gpt_config.label: GPT Config File:
gpt_config.tooltip:
Specifies a .yaml file to customize AI translator behavior.
Place your config files in the 'MangaStudio_Data/gpt_configs' folder.

pre_dict_path.label: Pre-Translation Dictionary:
pre_dict_path.tooltip: Path to a .txt file for correcting OCR errors BEFORE translation.

post_dict_path.label: Post-Translation Dictionary:
post_dict_path.tooltip: Path to a .txt file for correcting translation results AFTER translation.

detector.label: Detector Model:
detector.tooltip: The AI model used to find text bubbles on the page. 'default' is recommended for most comics.

detection_size.label: Detection Size:
detection_size.tooltip: The resolution the image is resized to for text detection. Higher values find smaller text but are slower.

ocr.label: OCR Model:
ocr.tooltip: The AI model used to read/recognize the characters inside the text bubbles.

ignore_bubble.label: Ignore Small Bubbles:
ignore_bubble.tooltip: Ignores any detected text bubbles smaller than this pixel area. Useful for filtering out noise or tiny sound effects.

use_mocr_merge.label: Use mOCR Merge
use_mocr_merge.tooltip: A special mode for the 'mocr' model that can improve accuracy on difficult fonts, but is slightly slower.

text_threshold.label: Text Threshold:
text_threshold.tooltip: How confident the detector must be to mark an area as 'text'. Lower values find more text but may include noise.

box_threshold.label: Box Threshold:
box_threshold.tooltip: How confident the detector must be to finalize the bounding box around the text. Higher values create tighter, more precise boxes.

unclip_ratio.label: Unclip Ratio:
unclip_ratio.tooltip: How much to expand the detected text box to capture outlines or parts of speech bubbles. Too high can cause boxes to merge.

det_rotate.label: Detect Rotated Text
det_rotate.tooltip: Enables detection of vertically or rotated text within a bubble.

det_auto_rotate.label: Auto-Rotate Image
det_auto_rotate.tooltip: Automatically rotates the entire image if it's detected to be sideways before processing.

det_invert.label: Invert Image Colors
det_invert.tooltip: Inverts the image colors (black to white and vice-versa) before detection. Useful for white text on black backgrounds.

det_gamma_correct.label: Gamma Correction
det_gamma_correct.tooltip: Applies gamma correction before detection. Can improve detection on certain image types.

min_text_length.label: Min. Text Length:
min_text_length.tooltip:
Ignores any recognized text shorter than this length.
Useful for filtering out noise or single characters.

prob.label: OCR Prob. Threshold:
prob.tooltip:
Minimum confidence for an OCR result to be accepted.
Leave blank for automatic backend default.

inpainter.label: Inpainter Model:
inpainter.tooltip: The AI model used to remove the original text and reconstruct the background.

inpainting_precision.label: Inpainting Precision:
inpainting_precision.tooltip: Calculation precision for inpainting. 'fp32' is most compatible. 'fp16' or 'bf16' are faster on modern GPUs.

inpainting_size.label: Inpainting Size:
inpainting_size.tooltip:
Resolution for the text removal process.
Higher values improve quality but are MUCH slower and use more VRAM.
(Recommended: 1024, Default for Backend: 2048)

upscaler.label: Upscaler Model:
upscaler.tooltip: The AI model used to increase the image resolution (upscale).

upscale_ratio.label: Upscale Ratio:
upscale_ratio.tooltip: How many times to multiply the image resolution. 'Disabled' will not perform upscaling.

revert_upscaling.label: Revert Upscaling After
revert_upscaling.tooltip: If checked, the image is upscaled for better processing, then scaled back down to its original size for the final output.

colorizer.label: Colorizer Model:
colorizer.tooltip: The AI model to colorize black and white manga pages.

colorization_size.label: Colorization Size:
colorization_size.tooltip: The base resolution for the colorization process. Higher values can improve detail but are slower.

denoise_sigma.label: Denoise Sigma:
denoise_sigma.tooltip: Strength of the denoising filter applied during colorization. Higher values remove more noise but can soften details.

restore_size_after_colorize.label: Restore Original Size After Colorize
restore_size_after_colorize.tooltip: EXPERIMENTAL: After colorizing, automatically calculate the required upscale ratio to restore the image to its original dimensions.

renderer.label: Render Engine:
renderer.tooltip: The engine used to draw the translated text onto the cleaned image.

font_family.label: Font:
font_family.tooltip: The font family to use for the translated text. You can use system fonts or place fonts in the 'fonts' folder.

font_color.label: Font Color:
font_color.tooltip: The color of the translated text in Hex format (e.g., 000000 for black).

alignment.label: Text Alignment:
alignment.tooltip: How to align the text within the speech bubble (left, center, right). 'auto' lets the renderer decide.

font_size_offset.label: Font Size Offset:
font_size_offset.tooltip: Fine-tune the automatically calculated font size. Positive values make text bigger, negative values make it smaller.

auto_rename.label: Auto-rename output folder
auto_rename.tooltip: Automatically renames the output folder with a language suffix (e.g., 'manga-ENG').

output_format.label: Output Format:
output_format.tooltip: Select the final image format. PNG is recommended for quality.

overwrite_output.label: Overwrite existing output folder
overwrite_output.tooltip: If checked, any existing output folder with the same name will be deleted before processing.

avoid_conflicts.label:
Avoid Overwriting 
(Create New Folder for each Run)
avoid_conflicts.tooltip:
RECOMMENDED.
If checked, the app will create a new numbered folder (e.g., 'Manga-ENG (1)') if an output folder with the same name already exists.
This prevents accidentally skipping a job or overwriting previous results.

Uncheck this only if you specifically want to re-run a job and overwrite its previous output.

backup_original.label: Create backup of original folder
backup_original.tooltip: Saves a copy of the original, untouched folder with a timestamp before processing.

filter_text.label: Filter Text (comma-sep):
filter_text.tooltip:
Enter patterns (comma-separated) for text you want the OCR to ignore.
This is useful for filtering out unwanted elements like sound effects (SFX),
 watermarks or consistent background text that you don't want translated.

Example: SFX, (NOISE), TO BE CONTINUED

Any text matching these patterns will be completely ignored during the translation process.

font_size.label: Font Size (Override):
font_size.tooltip: Manually set a fixed font size for all text. '0' or leaving it blank means automatic sizing.

line_spacing.label: Line Spacing:
line_spacing.tooltip: Manually set the space between lines of text. '0' or leaving it blank means automatic.

direction.label: Text Direction:
direction.tooltip: Set the text direction. 'auto' tries to guess from the text, but you can force horizontal/vertical.

mask_dilation_offset.label: Mask Dilation Offset:
mask_dilation_offset.tooltip:
Advanced: Expands (+) or shrinks (-) the mask around the text before inpainting. Can help clean text outlines.
Recommended: 10 to 30 to remove stubborn text ghosts.

kernel_size.label: Mask Kernel Size:
kernel_size.tooltip: Advanced: Size of the kernel used in mask processing. Must be an odd number. Affects how the mask is blurred.

disable_font_border.label: Disable Font Border
disable_font_border.tooltip: Removes the automatic black border/outline around the font.

uppercase.label: Force Uppercase
uppercase.tooltip: Forces all translated text to be UPPERCASE.

lowercase.label: Force Lowercase
lowercase.tooltip: Forces all translated text to be lowercase.

no_hyphenation.label: No Hyphenation
no_hyphenation.tooltip: Prevents the renderer from automatically splitting words with a hyphen (-).

rtl.label: Right-to-Left Reading Order
rtl.tooltip:
Enable for content that is read right-to-left, like manga.
This ensures speech bubbles are processed in the correct order.

font_size_minimum.label: Min. Font Size:
font_size_minimum.tooltip:
Prevents font size from falling below this value.
-1 disables this feature.

processing_mode.label: Processing Mode:
processing_mode.tooltip:
Automatic: Chooses the best mode based on your GPU's VRAM.
High VRAM: Processes all images at once. Fastest, for GPUs with >6GB VRAM.
Low VRAM: Processes images in small groups to prevent errors on GPUs with <=6GB VRAM.

batch_size.label: Batch Size (Low VRAM Only):
batch_size.tooltip:
How many images to process at a time in Low VRAM mode.
Smaller numbers use less VRAM but are slower.

api_key_manager.label: Manage API Keys
api_key_manager.tooltip: Opens the .env file where you can securely store your API keys.

enable_verbose_output.label: Enable Verbose Output âš
enable_verbose_output.tooltip:
WARNING:
This enables the backend's verbose mode (-v).
It saves all intermediate processing steps (masks, OCR boxes, etc.) into a 'debug_output' subfolder for each job.
This will consume a VERY LARGE amount of disk space and will significantly slow down the entire process.

It is STRONGLY recommended to keep this OFF for normal use.
